pillow_shade_settings.comment shade_color: the color that is blended into the pillow shaded polygons
pillow_shade_settings.comment texture_scale: Range = (0.1 to 1.0) the scale of the texture being used for blending. 1.0 means full screen, 0.5 means half screen.
pillow_shade_settings.comment texture_scale2: this affects performance as well as the overall quality and depth of the blurred texture.

default.maximum_on_screen_comment: number of labels with this text that can be on screen at one time.  0.0 is considered to mean no limit
number of labels with this text that can be on screen at one time.  0.0 is considered to mean no limit

flat_labels_build_rules.comments: Once these thresholds have been crossed, the dynamic labels are rebuilt.  These can affect performance for prettier results.

default.maximum_on_screen_comment: number of labels with this text that can be on screen at one time.  0.0 is considered to mean no limit
number of labels with this text that can be on screen at one time.  0.0 is considered to mean no limit
number of labels with this text that can be on screen at one time.  0.0 is considered to mean no limit
number of labels with this text that can be on screen at one time.  0.0 is considered to mean no limit

pixel_tolerances.comments: Once these thresholds have been crossed, the dynamic labels are rebuilt.  These can affect performance for prettier results.

feature_class_mapping__.level_of_detail_comment: The zoom level below which that detail level of data will be used.  This should be made per type that relies on lod

tile_filling.comment: coverage: try not to leave blank spots in map
ideal:    choose only the best tiles for a scene
zooming_coverage_otherwise_ideal: use coverage when zooming, ideal when stopped for x number of frames
overlay:  draw high res data on top of low res data
stencil:  overlay algorithm without double drawing

terrain.comment: If the terrain hasn't received the corresponding texture (like satellite data), it can still be rendered.

connectivity_based_labeling.edge_refresh_rate comment: the length of time, in seconds, between refreshes to check nearest edge segment
connectivity_based_labeling.only_show_connectivity_labels comment: when connectivity labeling is enabled and this flag is enabled only the connectivity labels will be rendered
connectivity_based_labeling.comment: node depth: the number of nodes of the same road the check. road depth: the number of unique roads to map from the starting edge

label_cache.billboard labels comment: capacity in megabytes for billboard data.  Will enforce a min of 0.5 and a max of 2.
label_cache.billboard icons comment: capacity in megabytes for billboard data.  Will enforce a min of 0.1 and a max of 0.25
label_cache.point labels comment: capacity in megabytes for billboard data.  Will enforce a min of 0.25 and a max of 1.

billboard_icons_culling.same_label_cull_bounds comment: the percentage of the screen within which another icon of the same crc cannot be shown

group_icons.bloomed_group_final_alpha_value_comment: when icon is bloomed, we animate the alpha value to this final value

danger_cone.operates_on_comment: an array of objects that the danger_cone operates on, specified by cull_immunity group

map.billboard_icons_as_billboard_labels_comm: This determines whether the perspective parameter works on icons as well as labels. (It's not named very clearly.)
map.alpha_test_new_style_comment: Alpha test enable/disable will now be done on a per renderer basis. To turn off, set to 0.0, otherwise, set up to 1.0.

default.comment: This is for testing icon grouping.

entity.comment: This is for testing icon grouping.
